alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 8:19PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Areas of dust will continue across portions of southern Lander and Eureka counties... An area of dust from the Carson sink has come across southern Lander and Eureka counties this evening. Remote sensors at the Austin Airport is showing a visibility of 3 miles and the dust is moving in an easterly direction. Portions of US Highway 50 from Austin east to Eureka may be affected by the dust, causing rapid reductions to visibility of two miles or less. If traveling along US Highway 50 tonight, please be aware that rapid reductions in visibility are possible. Use low beams if necessary, and take it slow. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
